author: protolambda
content:
<@!755590043632140352> about the epoch transition hiccups: it's not entirely new, we've seen it in CPU load and gossip too, as well as block-reorgs (note that teku also counts late blocks as reorgs in their metrics, I think). See graphs in https://github.com/ConsenSys/teku/issues/3326
Teku has two open PRs for epoch optimizations (not running it when not necessary, and catch up with optimizations of other clients). I've merged them with latest branch and built a docker image `protolambda/teku:fasterteku`, and about to try them out on Pyrmont.
